title: Microsoft Gahan Wilson's ultimate haunted house (PC)
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Multimedia systems
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
description: Race against the clock to escape a creepy, spooky haunted house that changes every time you play! Designed by Gahan Wilson this game has easy to access game help and loads of eerie sound effects to make playing fun for ages 8 and up! SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: a Multimedia PC or compatible; 486 DX or higher microprocessor running at 33 MHz; 8 Mb of RAM; 40 Kb of available hard disk space; Windows-compatible sound card; SVGA display capable of 256 colours; double-speed CD-ROM drive; Microsoft Windows 3.1 or later; MS-DOS 5.0 or later;
